name: War Cherubs
description:
A side-scrolling game about Cherubs locked in mortal combat with Cthulhu and his minions.  

Shoot arrows at enemies and avoid enemy fire on your way to face Cthulhu.

Controls:

WASD - up, left, down, right

Z - Fire arrows

ESC - quit

Created for the UE4 2019 Winter Game Jam

Sourced Assets:

UE4 SideScroller template + mannequin animations
Cupid model texture heavily modified from MakeHuman-exported young_lightskinned_male_diffuse2.png
Sound Phenomenon Fantasy Orchestra - Taylor Brook Music
Human Vocalizations - Gamemaster Audio
Autumn Audio Bundle - Hutvarev
